title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Fry bacon until crispy, then mix with pasta.
Remove from heat and stir in the egg-cheese mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.
